MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the FK11 postcode area of Menstrie is still ongoing. This is due to onsite difficulties during the replacement of an electricity pole and we now expect power to be back on by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.08pm on 3rd November 2020.
